name: 8PCS Oil Filter Wrench Set - Stainless Steel Oil Filter Removal Tool with 4 Oil Filter Wrench & 2 Oil Filter Pliers & 1 Universal Three-Jaw Removal Tool & 1 Conversion Head & 1 Storage Box
short_description: ✅【Premium Stainless Steel Construction】Built with a durable stainless steel band featuring a textured surface for maximum grip, preventing slippage.
